name: Electron (Black Cube Games)
description:
Electron is a physics based puzzle android game where the goal is to transfer an electron to a target in space. Navigate the space using only gravitational fields of other particles and make sure to collect all three collectables to complete each level.

In every level, the player has a number of electrons and has to point and shoot them in a direction to reach the destination. But the path to the goal is not always straightforward. This is where Protons and Neutrons come handy. These particles either attract or repulse the electron and help navigate the space. Electrons also have to avoid walls and other impassable objects. Some levels feature portals that teleport the electron across the space. Players have the power to change the size of protons and neutrons and control the attraction and repulsive power.
